languages.text: "Нет. После событий на офицерской палубе его стараются избегать". {n}Голос Вигдис подрагивает — кажется, она и сама боится личной беседы с ксеносом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Нет. После событий на офицерской палубе его стараются избегать". {n}Голос Вигдис подрагивает — кажется, она и сама боится личной беседы с ксеносом.{/n}

languages.text: "No. Since the incident on the officers' deck, everyone has been giving him a wide berth." {n}Vigdis's voice is trembling slightly. It appears that even she is afraid of approaching the xenos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Нет. После событий на офицерской палубе его стараются избегать". {n}Голос Вигдис подрагивает — кажется, она и сама боится личной беседы с ксеносом.{/n}

languages.text: "Nein. Seit dem Vorfall auf dem Offiziersdeck machen alle einen großen Bogen um ihn." {n}Vigdis' Stimme zittert leicht. Selbst sie hat offenbar Angst, sich dem Xenos zu nähern.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. Since the incident on the officers' deck, everyone has been giving him a wide berth." {n}Vigdis's voice is trembling slightly. It appears that even she is afraid of approaching the xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nein. Seit dem Vorfall auf dem Offiziersdeck machen alle einen großen Bogen um ihn." {n}Vigdis' Stimme zittert leicht. Selbst sie hat offenbar Angst, sich dem Xenos zu nähern.{/n}

languages.text: “还没有。自从军官甲板上发生了那件事情以后，所有人都对他敬而远之。”{n}维格迪斯的声音有些颤抖，似乎连她都害怕接近那个异形。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. Since the incident on the officers' deck, everyone has been giving him a wide berth." {n}Vigdis's voice is trembling slightly. It appears that even she is afraid of approaching the xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “还没有。自从军官甲板上发生了那件事情以后，所有人都对他敬而远之。”{n}维格迪斯的声音有些颤抖，似乎连她都害怕接近那个异形。{/n}

languages.text: « Non. Depuis l'incident sur le pont des officiers, tout le monde l'évite. » {n}La voix de Vigdis tremble légèrement. Même elle semble craindre le xénos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. Since the incident on the officers' deck, everyone has been giving him a wide berth." {n}Vigdis's voice is trembling slightly. It appears that even she is afraid of approaching the xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Non. Depuis l'incident sur le pont des officiers, tout le monde l'évite. » {n}La voix de Vigdis tremble légèrement. Même elle semble craindre le xénos.{/n}

languages.text: «No. Desde el incidente en la cubierta de oficiales, todo el mundo está guardando las distancias». {n}La voz de Vigdis tiembla ligeramente. Parece que hasta a ella le da miedo acercarse al xenos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. Since the incident on the officers' deck, everyone has been giving him a wide berth." {n}Vigdis's voice is trembling slightly. It appears that even she is afraid of approaching the xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No. Desde el incidente en la cubierta de oficiales, todo el mundo está guardando las distancias». {n}La voz de Vigdis tiembla ligeramente. Parece que hasta a ella le da miedo acercarse al xenos.{/n}

languages.text: 「いいえ。士官デッキでの事件以来、誰もが彼とは距離を置いています」{n}ヴィグディスの声は微かに震えている。彼女は近づいてくる異種族にさえ恐怖を抱いているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. Since the incident on the officers' deck, everyone has been giving him a wide berth." {n}Vigdis's voice is trembling slightly. It appears that even she is afraid of approaching the xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「いいえ。士官デッキでの事件以来、誰もが彼とは距離を置いています」{n}ヴィグディスの声は微かに震えている。彼女は近づいてくる異種族にさえ恐怖を抱いているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: "Hayır. Subay güvertesinde yaşananlardan sonra herkes ondan uzak duruyor." {n}Vigdis'in sesi hafiften titriyor. Görünüşe göre o bile zenoya yaklaşmaya korkuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. Since the incident on the officers' deck, everyone has been giving him a wide berth." {n}Vigdis's voice is trembling slightly. It appears that even she is afraid of approaching the xenos.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hayır. Subay güvertesinde yaşananlardan sonra herkes onunla arasına güvenli bir mesafe koyuyor." {n}Vigdis'in sesi hafiften titriyor. Görünüşe göre zenoya yaklaşmaya o bile korkuyor.{/n}
